name: Gravedigger
description:
This is Gravedigger, a game about rescuing yourself from a curse that transformed you into a weremole, after discovering the wereabouts of an ancient king grave.

This game was made in 2014 (I think?) for Ludum Dare 36 (was it?? I'm sorry I don't clearly remember these numbers). It's a short game since it was made in 2 days, with Game Maker.

I hope you enjoy it.
